text: The Illinois Central Railroad 300 Class was a Class of 100 American 4-6-0 type Steam Locomotives built for the Illinois Central Railroad they were numbered 301-400 . They were built between 1881 and 1898 . All of them were scrapped by the 1930’s and 40’s . One locomotive built in 1898 numbered 382 was famous for the death of Casey Jones (Engineer) in 1900 . A locomotive in the The Lone Ranger (movie) known as the Constitution numbered 148 (formerly 29) looks like the engine despite the story set in 1869 after the American Civil War .
title: Illinois Central 300 Class 4-6-0
